response.overview: The story follows Liam, a college student, as he runs for SLB in a dystopian society, being brought to the ground by a corrupt government. With help from a cast of cooky and wacky characters, Liam takes on the world, in a coming-of-age narrative about self-discovery and what it means to live. What could go wrong? Grab your popcorn and find out in this action-packed epic that is bound to be fun for the whole family.
response.tagline: I've Got This In The Bag
response.title: Sad Lover Boys
